function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate information on masks and virus transmission","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of the virus due to misinformation","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns on proper mask usage and virus transmission routes","Technologies":"Social media algorithms for fact-checking and flagging misinformation","People":"General public, social media users","Owner":"Social media platforms, health authorities"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of social media platforms' efforts to remove misinformation","Impact":"Spread of inaccurate information despite efforts to remove it","Mitigation":"Regular audits and reviews of content removal processes, collaboration with health organizations for accuracy","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence for content moderation, collaboration tools for health organizations","People":"Users of social media platforms","Owner":"Facebook, Google, Twitter"},{"Description":"Low presence of accurate information in peer-reviewed journals and official institutions websites","Impact":"Limited access to accurate information for the public","Mitigation":"Increased emphasis on peer-reviewed research, collaboration between research institutions and public health authorities for dissemination","Technologies":"Open-access publishing platforms, collaboration tools for research institutions","People":"General public, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities"}]}
